title: Randy Pitchford Sued, Rocket League Cross-Play Confirmed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.14.19
description:
The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/kindafunnygamesdaily to start your trial now.

Tim and Greg run you through the Borderlands lawsuit, Rocket League cross-play, and more!

Time Codes - 
00:04:12 - Housekeeping
Greg’s Hosting the Star Trek: Discovery Season 2 Red Carpet Thursday! Season two of STAR TREK: DISCOVERY premieres Thursday, Jan. 17, 2019 at 8:30 PM, ET/5:30 PM, PT exclusively on CBS All Access.
Shout-out to Aftercharge! Party Mode is live on YouTube now, and Andy’s streaming it Saturday! We’re giving away 100 code; stay tuned to our Twitter.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:12 - Randy Pitchford Lawsuit, Jason @ Kotaku
00:20:30 - The PlayStation Cross-Play Beta program gets a new addition today RocketLeague! @DunhamSmash
00:24:28 - SNES Games on Switch? @KapuccinoHeck
00:34:45 - Top PSN Downloads of 2018
00:33:28 - Epic Games Store Refund Policy (Epic’s Director of Pub Strat)
00:36:50 - Verizon Getting in on Cloud Gaming, Chris Welch @ The Verge
00:40:30 - Out today
00:41:02 -Skillshare
Reader mail   -
00:45:45 - My question is a follow up of sorts surrounding the Activision and Bungie split. Maybe this is a bit of a Sony Pony tinfoil hat thought but is there any chance that Sony could try to add Bungie to their group of Sony Exclusive developers? - Josh
00:47:12 - What game (and/or what game studio) will win the Game Award for Game of the Year in 2019? - James (16BitsOfAwesome)
00:51:57 - Squad Up: Alexander Preston (Pokemon Go) - Trainer Code: 363594046907 (LukeSkyburger)
00:53:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:
TUESDAY: Greg and Andrea
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Jared (Building the Doc) and Tim
FRIDAY: Andrea (Building the Doc) and Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
